name: Yet Another Hard Platformer
description:
Y.A.H.P. is a hardcore platformer, your goal is reach finish flag and not break your keyboard when playing

This game contains:

1. Jumping

2. Running

3. Obstacles

4. Death

5. Obstacles that cause permanent Death

6. Restart

7. Hardcore

8. Changing color of objects and background in main menu

9. Death
